title: raritycheck
author: raritycheck
content: TIME LEFT: END TIME:  22 Jan, 6:00 PM NY TIME.Up for auction is Set of 15 silver 2016 panda 10 yen coins   Each coin is 30 grams in weight. Pure 999 fine silver. (Total 450 grams of pure silver)Composition   Silver (.999)Weight   30 gDiameter   40 mmThickness   2.98 mm None of the coins have ever been taken out of the packaging.More info: https://en.numista.com/catalogue/pieces80896.html   STARTING BID: 0.020 BTC   MINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.000 BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places** **Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 10 minutes will extend the auction 10 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 10 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 10 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING
